Uses of Class
components.Package

Packages that use Package
Package Description
components  

  • Uses of Package in components

    Subclasses of Package in components
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  NonStandardPackage
    Represents a package with non standard size
    A non standard package is a Package with a specific width, length and height
    class  SmallPackage
    Represents a small package
    A small package is a package that weighs only one unit
    class  StandardPackage
    Represents a package with varying weights over one unit
    Methods in components that return Package
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Package Package.clone()
    Returns a clone of this package
    Package Package.mementoClone()
    Create a perfect clone (copy lists also)
    Methods in components that return types with arguments of type Package
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> MainOffice.getCurrentHubPacks()
    Create packages list of all NonStandardPackages that the hub working with
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> MainOffice.getCurrentPacksByBranch​(int id)
    Create a packages list of all packages that the specific branch working with
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> Branch.getListPackages()
    Get an access to the packages list
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> Customer.getPackages()  
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> MainOffice.getPackages()
    Get an access to the packages list
    java.util.ArrayList<Package> Truck.getPackages()
    Get access to the packages list
    Methods in components with parameters of type Package
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Truck.addPackage​(Package pack)
    Adding a package to the packages list of the vehicle
    There are no duplicate packages on the list
    void Branch.collectPackage​(Package p)
    Collect the package to listPackages.
    void Customer.collectPackage​(Package p)  
    void Node.collectPackage​(Package p)
    Collect the package to the current node
    void NonStandardTruck.collectPackage​(Package p)
    Collect the package to the vehicle.
    Can not add if the size of the package is not much to the vehicle.
    void StandardTruck.collectPackage​(Package p)
    Collecting the package to the vehicle
    -Can only collect small and standard packages
    -Can not add a package if there is not enough space
    void Van.collectPackage​(Package p)
    Adding the package to the packages list
    Can only add a SmallPackage or StandardPackage Only one Package each time
    void Package.copyFrom​(Package p)
    Copy values from another package to this one
    void Branch.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    Remove the package from listPackages.
    void Customer.deliverPackage​(Package p)  
    void Node.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    Remove the package from the current node
    void StandardTruck.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    Remove the package from the vehicle
    void Truck.deliverPackage​(Package p)
    Remove the package from the truck
    Will print a massage if the package is not exists on packages list
    default void Node.handlePackage​(Package p, Node source, Node dest, Status status)
    Take care to transfer the package and add a record to the package tracking
    boolean NonStandardTruck.isCanFit​(Package pack)
    Check if the vehicle can fit the package
    boolean StandardTruck.isCanFit​(Package p)
    Check if the package can fit in the Truck in cases of over weight
    void Hub.setNonStandardTrip​(Package p, Truck t)
    Sets NonStandardTruck trip from source to destination
    void NonStandardTruck.setTripToCustomer​(Package p)
    Update the trip from source of package to the destination
